tvdb: In London, Kevin and Lucy make a family connection between Paige and Alison and Paige decides she wants to meet Ali before leaving Earth.  After seeing Rebecca's portrait, which looks like Paige, Rafe fears Paige wants to take Ali back with them to fill the 5th chair.  Frightened, Rafe asks Ali to runaway with him.  After Ian sees an invisible Amy appear in front of him, she knocks him out and runs away.  Ian catches up with her and demands an explanation.  She explains she died and is an angel who was given a 2nd chance at life.  Amy also says she loves him and asks him to stay with her during her final 3 days on Earth.
